sentence.Network_en: A receptacle to hold the relics of saints; a reliquary.
sentence.Network_cn: 神龛存放圣骨的容器; 圣骨盒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... relinquishment 作罢 reliquary 遗骨匣 relique 遗物.
圣物柜（Reliquary）：每次消耗伟人时获得50信仰宗教是早期决定外交的重要因素，在中世纪与文艺复兴时宗教的外交修正值最大。
拉丁语reliquiae意为"remains"（剩余物，遗体遗骨）。圣髑盒（reliquary）是保有一个或数个圣髑的朝圣地（shrine）。
English notes ... nephew and niece 侄子/侄女 reliquary 圣骨盒; 圣物箱 ornamental 观赏植物.

list.abs: Happiness an antique reliquary painted on one side only ., 幸福是个只有一面上了漆的旧木头框框.

list.exp: 查理曼大帝的金圣物箱
list.abs: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝腓特烈一世：Friedrich I，Holy Roman Emperor查理曼大帝的金圣物箱：Golden reliquary of Emperor Charlemagne;伦巴第工匠: Lombard craftsman;

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French reliquaire, from Old French relique (see relic)

entry.tran: (保存圣人遗物的)圣骨匣, 遗骨匣, 圣物箱
entry.def: A reliquary is a container where religious objects connected with a saint are kept.

means.word_mean: 1. a container where religious relics are stored or displayed (especially relics of saints)

auth_sentence.content: Some scholars have suggested that the writing is from a reliquary attached to the cloth in medieval times.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some scholars have suggested that the writing is from a reliquary attached to the cloth in medieval times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some scholars have suggested that the writing is from a reliquary attached to the cloth in medieval times.

auth_sentence.content: Here is an exquisite reliquary from the shrine of Saint Oda that harbours a phial of the Virgin Mary's breast milk.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here is an exquisite reliquary from the shrine of Saint Oda that harbours a phial of the Virgin Mary's breast milk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here is an exquisite reliquary from the shrine of Saint Oda that harbours a phial of the Virgin Mary's breast milk.
